TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PeerResolver extends System.Object

summary.span: Specifies a base type used to define the contract for the registration and resolution of a peer mesh ID to the endpoint addresses of nodes participating in the mesh.

span.span: Specifies a base type used to define the contract for the registration and resolution of a peer mesh ID to the endpoint addresses of nodes participating in the mesh.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是实现自定义对等名解析程序的基类。This class is the base class for the implementation of custom peer name resolvers. 对等名解析程序是对等通道用于查找参与对等网格的对等节点的发现服务。A peer name resolver is a discovery service used by peer channels to find peer nodes participating in a peer mesh. 它还可以用于在对等网格中“注册”节点，即对等节点在对等网格中变为已知和可用的机制。It is also used to "register" a node with a peer mesh, the mechanism by which the peer node becomes known and available from the peer mesh.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅初始化现有对等解析程序实例；它并不创建新解析程序。This method simply initializes the existing peer resolver instance; it does not create a new one. 若要创建新的对等解析程序，请在相应的绑定元素（例如，）上调用 CreatePeerResolver 方法。To create a new peer resolver, call the CreatePeerResolver method on the corresponding binding element (for example, ).

summary.span: Removes the registration entry for a node from a peer mesh.

span.span: Removes the registration entry for a node from a peer mesh.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注册 ID 是一个对等解析程序令牌，它至少可用于表示对等节点 ID 和网格 ID 的元组。A registration ID is a peer resolver token, that, at the very minimum, represents the tuple of a peer node ID and the mesh ID. 必须已在先前对 的调用中获得此 ID 值。This ID value must have been obtained in a previous call to . 可在两个特定情况下调用： is called in two specific cases: - 当 离开对等网格时（通常是因为关闭了与之相关联的最后一个对等通道或服务主机）。When the is leaving the peer mesh (usually as the result of closing the last peer channel or service host that is associated with it). - 当 找不到参与对等网格的其他节点的可用终结点地址时。When the can find no available endpoint addresses of other nodes participating in the peer mesh. 因此， 将不再可以访问，它将尝试调用 以便从 中注销自身。As a result, the is no longer reachable, and it will attempt to call to unregister itself from the . 如果网格中的其他对等节点在注销后变为可用，节点可以通过调用 并获取新的注册 ID 来重新注册。If other peer nodes within the mesh become available subsequent to unregistration, the node can re-register itself by calling and obtaining a new registration ID.
